titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the House amendments to the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 2642) making appropriations for military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2008, and for other purposes.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 239.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-720, by Ms. Slaughter.

The rule makes in order a motion offered by the chairman of the Committee on Appropriations that the House (1) concur in the Senate amendment to the House amendment numbered 1 and (2) concur in the Senate amendment to the House amendment numbered 2 with the amendment printed in the Rules Committee report. The motion shall be considered
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1284.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 342 - 83 (Roll no. 429).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/19/2008--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendments to the House amendments to the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 2642) making appropriations for military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2008.
